quote: Doing a little at once can fix something, eventually, but i feel like when you believe something is truly a problem, you throw everything you have at it, because you just can't help yourself.
quote_letters: DOING A LITTLE AT ONCE CAN FIX SOMETHING EVENTUALLY BUT I FEEL LIKE WHEN YOU BELIEVE SOMETHING IS TRULY A PROBLEM YOU THROW EVERYTHING YOU HAVE AT IT BECAUSE YOU JUST CANT HELP YOURSELF
